title: Animated Bar Chart in Power BI
excerpt: This video, represents the Animated Bar Chart in Power BI. We know, Power BI is a great visualization tool. The video is created with custom Power BI visualization named "Animated Bar Chart Racer".  You can download the Sample Data Source file and Power BI file using the following URL:  https://github.com/Dhruvinshah16/Power-BI/tree/master/PBI-AnimatedBarChart
